MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the SY10 postcode area of Oswestry, affecting properties in Croesau Bach and surrounding area. This is causing reduced power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.08PM. Our emergency response team is currently on site carrying out investigations and will commence repairs to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. Once we receive information from them we will make every effort to let you know when the power will be restored. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.05PM on 25th March 2021.
